verses.verse: O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> for you have fallen <S%H3782><s%> by your iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> with you words, <S%H1697><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to him, Take <S%H5375><s%> away all <S%H3605><s%> iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and receive <S%H3947><s%> us graciously: <S%H2896><s%> so will we render <S%H7999><s%> the calves <S%H6499><s%> of our lips. <S%H8193><s%>

Asshur <S%H804><s%> shall not save <S%H3467><s%> us; we will not ride <S%H7392><s%> on horses: <S%H5483><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will we say <S%H559><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> to the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands, <S%H3027><s%> You are our gods: <S%H430><s%> for in you the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> finds mercy. <S%H7355><s%>
I will heal <S%H7495><s%> their backsliding, <S%H4878><s%> I will love <S%H157><s%> them freely: <S%H5071><s%> for my anger <S%H639><s%> is turned <S%H7725><s%> away from him.

I will be as the dew <S%H2919><s%> to Israel: <S%H3478><s%> he shall grow <S%H6524><s%> as the lily, <S%H7799><s%> and cast <S%H5221><s%> forth <S%H5221><s%> his roots <S%H8328><s%> as Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
His branches <S%H3127><s%> shall spread, <S%H3212><s%> and his beauty <S%H1935><s%> shall be as the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, and his smell <S%H7381><s%> as Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

They that dwell <S%H3427><s%> under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> shall return; <S%H7725><s%> they shall revive <S%H2421><s%> as the corn, <S%H1715><s%> and grow <S%H6524><s%> as the vine: <S%H1612><s%> the scent <S%H2143><s%> thereof shall be as the wine <S%H8492><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall say, What <S%H4100><s%> have I to do any more <S%H5750><s%> with idols? <S%H6091><s%> I have heard <S%H6030><s%> him, and observed <S%H7789><s%> him: I am like a green <S%H7488><s%> fir <S%H1265><s%> tree. From me is your fruit <S%H6529><s%> found. <S%H4672><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is wise, <S%H2450><s%> and he shall understand <S%H995><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things? prudent, <S%H995><s%> and he shall know <S%H3045><s%> them? for the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are right, <S%H3477><s%> and the just <S%H6662><s%> shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in them: but the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> therein.
